Posts.EditableText: My suggestion...  start SMALL.  Make a bunch of sample games.  Might even be a good idea to create a game wherein each room you set up solutions to things you want to do, especially if those things seem troublesome the first time around.  I have done this and I reference it ALL the time.  It's a nice way to solve problems.  Good luck and don't be afraid to ask questions!
Posts.HTML: My suggestion... start SMALL. Make a bunch of sample games. Might even be a good idea to create a game wherein each room you set up solutions to things you want to do, especially if those things seem troublesome the first time around. I have done this and I reference it ALL the time. It's a nice way to solve problems. Good luck and don't be afraid to ask questions!
